org.glite.authz.common.http
Class BaseHttpServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.glite.authz.common.http.BaseHttpServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceMetricsServlet
public abstract class BaseHttpServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

A base class for Servlets within the authorization service. This class is responsible for properly responding to HTTP methods not supported by the particular endpoint.

See Also:

getSupportedMethods

protected abstract String getSupportedMethods()
Gets the HTTP methods supported by this Servlet. This information is used to populate the HTTP "Allow" header.

Returns:
HTTP methods supported by this Servlet
